column4: im having a problem involving my gnome-panel, i at some point must have deleted the task icon for gaim and now it does not show the icon when it is running, i can still click where it should be, just no graphic, any ideas please
so try that then?
thanks
it might also be hidden by the elements on the panel somehow
its just showing a single vertical line of pixels now, but nothing else gained
any other ideas
the one with VLC problems?
i was having probs with the gnome panel
ohh
dont know. sorry
any idea where the icon would be stored
do you have the Tray added to the panel?  any other tray icons showing up?
i believe it is added since i am able to use the "icons" although i cant see them
oh gaim icon is missing?  missing pixmap maybe, reinstall gaim>?
tried that using synaptic, is there a specific way you knwo thats better
uhhh..."sudo dpkg --force-all --purge gaim && sudo apt-get install gaim" i guess.  that may purge personal settings and logs though
and i doubt it will fix the problem
thanks for the try then
hey again, i was the one having gaim icon problems, reinstalling ubuntu-desktop packg fixedd it, thanks for the help
very interesting because that package doesnt contain any files
at least as far as i know :O
